shift in leadership, Google co-founder Larry Page will take charge of the company's day-to-day operations as chief executive officer, replacing current CEO Eric Schmidt , who will focus on strategic projects, in particular new products. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google. Steve Blake , traded to Milwaukee in the offseason and acquired by Denver from the Bucks last week, had a career-high 25 points against his former team Sunday night, in Denver's 109-93 victory over Portland. I'm not surprised because a good basketball player is a good basketball player and that's what he is, said Steve Blake 's new teammate, Allen Iverson . Allen Iverson had 32 points and nine assists for the Nuggets, who trailed at halftime but outscored the Blazers 41-17 in the third quarter. The victory snapped a two-game losing streak

Ms. Debbie Wasserman Schultz is a co-captain for the House on a Congressional women's softball team, and Ms. Kirsten Gillibrand serves as a co-captain for the Senate side.
